params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.
params.tokenId: The unique identifier of the ticket being added to the wallet.
params.wallet: The wallet address to which the ticket ID will be added.

params.protocol: The address of the protocol proposing the show.

params.ticketId: Unique identifier of the ticket within the show.

params.wallet: Address of the wallet for which token IDs are being retrieved

returns._0: An array of token IDs associated with the show for the specified wallet

params._selloutProtocolWallet: Address of the Sellout Protocol Wallet (owner).
params._showVault: Address of the Show Vault contract.
params._ticketFactory: Address of the Ticket Factory contract.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.
params.tokenId: The unique identifier of the token to check.
params.wallet: The address of the wallet to check for token ownership.

returns._0: True if the tokenId exists in the wallet's list of tokens for the specified show, false otherwise.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.
params.tokenId: The unique identifier of the ticket being removed from the wallet.
params.wallet: The wallet address from which the ticket ID will be removed.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.ticketId: Unique identifier of the ticket within the show.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.paymentToken: Payment token address; address(0) for ETH.
params.ticketId: ID of the ticket being refunded.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

addTokenIdToWallet(bytes32,address,uint2.notice: Adds a token ID to a user's wallet for a specific show, signifying ticket ownership.

createAndInitializeTicketProxy(bytes32,a.notice: Creates and initializes a ticket proxy for a given show.

getTicketPricePaid(bytes32,uint256).notice: Retrieves the price paid for a specific ticket of a show.

getTotalTicketsSold(bytes32).notice: Gets the total number of tickets sold for a specific show.

getWalletTokenIds(bytes32,address).notice: Retrieves the token IDs associated with a specific show for a given wallet

initialize(address,address,address,addre.notice: Initializes the BoxOffice contract with required addresses.

isTokenOwner(bytes32,address,uint256).notice: Checks if a given tokenId exists in the wallet's list of tokenIds for a specific show.

removeTokenIdFromWallet(bytes32,address,.notice: Removes a token ID from a user's wallet for a specific show.

setTicketPricePaid(bytes32,uint256,uint2.notice: Sets the price paid for a specific ticket of a show.

setTotalTicketsSold(bytes32,uint256).notice: Sets the total number of tickets sold for a specific show.

showContractInstance().notice: Instance of the IShow contract to interact with show-related functionalities.

showVaultInstance().notice: Instance of the IShowVault contract to handle financial transactions related to shows.

ticketFactoryInstance().notice: Instance of the ITicketFactory contract used for ticket creation and management.

ticketPricePaid(bytes32,uint256).notice: Mapping from show ID to token ID, then to the price paid for that particular ticket.

totalTicketsSold(bytes32).notice: Mapping from show ID to the total number of tickets sold for that show.

updateTicketsSoldAndShowStatusAfterRefun.notice: Updates total tickets sold and potentially the show status after a ticket refund.

walletToShowToTokenIds(bytes32,address,u.notice: Mapping to associate wallet addresses with show IDs and token IDs of purchased tickets.
